For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section. Alternatively, you can also call us on 08071324888. notes.body: Hello Adnan,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   With reference to your order #659971858882924544-47069, I understand that you wish to cancel the PharmEasy Plus membership.     Please be informed that once an order is placed, we are unable to modify or cancel it. Since the Plus membership was purchased as part of this order, we are unable to cancel the membership for this ongoing order.     I request you to place a new order with the required modifications.     I appreciate your patience and understanding in this regard.  ​  For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the Need Help section. Alternatively, you can also call us on 08071324888.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  Tahera

notes.body: Hello Shyam,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regard to order #659967286591979520-24655, I understand your concern regarding the discount calculation in your order.     Please note that we do provide up to 10% medicine/product level discount to all of our customers. The discount details can be checked while placing an order. However, I would like to inform you that we have multiple active offers updated on the app/ website. For your future orders.     To know more about our offers, please visit our website or click on the link mentioned below:- https://pharmeasy.in/offers?src=header     Please be informed that we give product-level discounts. The discount percentage on every item will vary across categories and will be visible on an item level on the product page. Also, the maximum discount applicable on the coupon code was Rs. 300/-     *TC was mentioned. Please see the details below for your reference for the coupon code that was mentioned under the terms and conditions of the offer.     As I checked, we have given a 14.26% discount on your medicine order. The 20% discount is not on MRP, it is as per the PharmEasy discount process.     Kindly refer to the below FAQ link:  https://pharmeasy.in/help/promotions-43000349470/how-is-the-discount-calculated--43000542784     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section. Alternatively, you can also call us on 08071324888.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy.     Regards,  Tahera
notes.body_html:
Hello Shyam,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regard to order #659967286591979520-24655, I understand your concern regarding the discount calculation in your order.

Please note that we do provide up to 10% medicine/product level discount to all of our customers. The discount details can be checked while placing an order. However, I would like to inform you that we have multiple active offers updated on the app/ website. For your future orders.

To know more about our offers, please visit our website or click on the link mentioned below:- https://pharmeasy.in/offers?src=header

Please be informed that we give product-level discounts. The discount percentage on every item will vary across categories and will be visible on an item level on the product page. Also, the maximum discount applicable on the coupon code was Rs. 300/-

*TC was mentioned. Please see the details below for your reference for the coupon code that was mentioned under the terms and conditions of the offer.

As I checked, we have given a 14.26% discount on your medicine order. The 20% discount is not on MRP, it is as per the PharmEasy discount process.

Kindly refer to the below FAQ link:
https://pharmeasy.in/help/promotions-43000349470/how-is-the-discount-calculated--43000542784

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section. Alternatively, you can also call us on 08071324888.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy.

Regards,
Tahera
